uk.ac.leeds.geog.gy13rjt.todo

Class PersistentExtensionAddIn

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.esri.arcgis.addins.desktop.Extension
      • uk.ac.leeds.geog.gy13rjt.todo.PersistentExtensionAddIn

  • public class PersistentExtensionAddIn
extends com.esri.arcgis.addins.desktop.Extension
    Set up event handlers to catch creation of new map document or opening of existing ones. Each of these must reset the task list. With an existing map document, any task list already embedded in the document will be retrieved.
    Version:
    1.0, 18 March 2014
    Author:
    Richard Thomas

      • init

        public void init(com.esri.arcgis.framework.IApplication app)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 com.esri.arcgis.interop.AutomationException
        Initializes this application extension with the ArcMap application instance it is hosted in. This method is automatically called by the host ArcMap application. It marks the start of the dockable window's lifecycle. Clients must not call this method.
        Specified by:
        init in class com.esri.arcgis.addins.desktop.Extension
